'''Photo of a Strange Rock''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained through exploration in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]]. 

There are a total of five, and collecting at least one lets the player start the {{Quest|Paleontological Investigation in The Chasm}}. Submitting the five photos to [[Khedive]] will complete the quest.
